name: Music_223.wav
keywords: ['techno song', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'trance music', 'programmed percussion', 'synth', 'moderate tempo', 'dance song', 'club music']
caption: This techno song features programmed percussion. The kick is played on every count of the beat. A cymbal or shaker is played in sixteenth note patterns. This is accompanied by a synth playing a repetitive sequence. Another synth sound is played in bursts which has a warped sound effect. This song is an instrumental and has no voices. This song can be played in a club.
